products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Roman Blind in Black. Made to measure from £15.58 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple yet stylish the Black Faux Suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the modern contemporary home. 
 
Our Faux Suede collection comes in a variety of colours which include pinks, naturals and tones of colour which are highly sought after in today’s interiors. 
 
All our blinds are made to measure to your measurements right here in West Yorkshire. Our skilled seamstresses hold a wealth of experience, so you can be assured that a quality roman blind will be manufactured and delivered to you. 
 
Swift Blinds Direct are proud that our customers vote us excellent on Trustpilot reviews. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0002 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Panama Black Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Panama Black Roman Blind in Black. Made to measure from £16.80 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Panama range is avilable in a full rainbow of colours so we are sure you will find the shade to compliment your décor. 
 
This 100% cotton black roman blind is classic and so is the perfect choice to add style and elegance to any room in your home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0112 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Cotton Panama Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

Our Basket Weave range is a combination of the soft fabric and attractive colours. Available as curtains and Roman blinds, you will be able to find the one that suits your style. 
 The Basket Weave Black Roman blind is an excellent choice to transform your home.

products.title: Artisan Jet
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Artisan Jet Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 84% Polyester / 16% Cotton
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
